verses.roman:
tabe dui bhāi tāṅre marite nā dila
nija tṛtīya bhāi kari' nikaṭe rākhila

synonyms: tabe—at that time; dui bhāi—the two brothers (Śrīla Rūpa and Sanātana); tāṅre—him; marite—to die; nā dila—did not allow; nija—own; tṛtīya—third; bhāi—brother; kari'-accepting; nikaṭe—near; rākhila—kept him.
translation: These two brothers, however, did not allow him to die. They accepted him as their third brother and kept him in their company.
